verses.text: Hear \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! Let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

Don’t hide \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* distress. Turn \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*. Answer \w me|strong="H8085"\w* quickly \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* day \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w call|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* consume \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w like|strong="H3117"\w* smoke. \w My|strong="H5641"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3117"\w* burned \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* torch.

\w My|strong="H3615"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3117"\w* blighted \w like|strong="H3615"\w* grass, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* withered, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* forget \w to|strong="H3117"\w* eat \w my|strong="H3615"\w* bread.

\w By|strong="H3588"\w* reason \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* groaning, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones stick \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* skin.

\w I|strong="H6963"\w* am like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pelican \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* wilderness. \w I|strong="H6963"\w* have become as \w an|strong="H6963"\w* owl \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* waste places.

\w I|strong="H1961"\w* watch, \w and|strong="H4057"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1819"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sparrow \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* alone \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* housetop.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* enemies reproach \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* day. \w Those|strong="H5921"\w* who \w are|strong="H1961"\w* mad \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w use|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* name \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* curse.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* eaten ashes \w like|strong="H3117"\w* bread, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* mixed \w my|strong="H3605"\w* drink \w with|strong="H3117"\w* tears,

\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* indignation \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* wrath; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* taken \w me|strong="H3588"\w* up \w and|strong="H3899"\w* thrown \w me|strong="H3588"\w* away.

\w My|strong="H5375"\w* days \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H6440"\w* shadow. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5375"\w* withered \w like|strong="H6440"\w* grass.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3117"\w* remain \w forever|strong="H3117"\w*; \w your|strong="H5186"\w* renown endures \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* generations.

\w You|strong="H1755"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* arise \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* Zion, \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* pity \w on|strong="H3427"\w* her. Yes, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w time|strong="H5769"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* come.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* servants \w take|strong="H6965"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* stones, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H7355"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* dust.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w will|strong="H5650"\w* fear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s name, all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* glory.

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* built \w up|strong="H4428"\w* Zion. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* appeared \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* responded \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* destitute, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* despised \w their|strong="H3068"\w* prayer.

\w This|strong="H6437"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* written \w for|strong="H8605"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* generation \w to|strong="H6437"\w* come. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* which \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* created \w will|strong="H3808"\w* praise \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H3050"\w* looked \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* height \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H5971"\w* sanctuary. \w From|strong="H5971"\w* heaven, \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* saw \w the|strong="H1984"\w* earth,

\w to|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* groans \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* prisoner, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* free \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* condemned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* death,

\w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w declare|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s name \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* praise \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Jerusalem,

\w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peoples \w are|strong="H3068"\w* gathered together, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* kingdoms, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* serve \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w He|strong="H3068"\w* weakened \w my|strong="H3068"\w* strength along \w the|strong="H5647"\w* course. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* shortened \w my|strong="H3068"\w* days.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* said, “\w My|strong="H6031"\w* God, don’t take \w me|strong="H3117"\w* \w away|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* middle \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H6031"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. \w Your|strong="H6031"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* generations.

\w Of|strong="H3117"\w* \w old|strong="H8141"\w*, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w laid|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*. \w The|strong="H3117"\w* heavens \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* work \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* hands.

\w They|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* perish, but \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w endure|strong="H6440"\w*. Yes, \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* wear \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* change \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cloak, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* changed.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H1992"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* years \w will|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* end.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* children \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* servants \w will|strong="H3808"\w* continue. \w Their|strong="H3808"\w* offspring \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w established|strong="H3808"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.”
